0.text: Hey %player%. I heard you might be migrating for work soon.

1.text: That's my plan.You went to Taiwan last year to work, right?

3.text: What made you decide to go to Taiwan?

4.text: Did you go through the government or a broker?

6.text: Honestly, price. There's good money to be made in Japan, but the visa cost... It can cost a lot just to go in the first place, I didn't want to go into any debt.

9.text: Would you have gone to Japan if you could have?

10.text: Maybe... another thing was the language barrier. I spoke some Mandarin.

7.text: The government. They're more cost effective, but they've got their issues.

11.text: I won't bog you down with details... just be careful.

8.text: Do you really want to know?

12.text: It's rough. I know I didn't have it as bad as some people, but the hours were incredibly long with very few breaks. No vacation.

14.text: I've heard lots of people do get vacation, but there's always something to watch out for. Employers messing with your paperwork or hidden program fees... you have to be careful.

13.text: [i]Ha[/i]. Well, ignorance is bliss. But you should ask someone before you leave.
